body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi there, thank you for contacting our customer support team! My name is Charles Walker and I'm from Vehicle Pros, how can I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Lisa. To better assist you, may I have your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the thirteenth of March, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also provide the last four digits of your social security number for security reasons?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my social security number are eight nine six two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for that information, Lisa. Is there a specific issue or question you have regarding our Car Dealership inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm having trouble finding the specific model I'm interested in and it's frustrating.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Lisa. Let me look into this for you. Thank you for sharing your concerns. We will do our best to resolve this matter. Thank you for your time today, Lisa, we appreciate your patience. Have a great day!
